pregunta: Os estáis sentando en mi escritorio
Os habéis sentado en mi silla
respuesta: You have sat on my chair
incorrecta1: You had sat on my chair
incorrecta2: You have sit on my chair

pregunta: Os sentasteis con Robert el otro día
respuesta: You sat with Robert the other day
incorrecta1: You had sat with Robert the other day
incorrecta2: You have sit with Robert the other day
incorrecta3: You have sat with Robert the other day

pregunta: Os vais a sentar y vamos a hablar
respuesta: You're going to sit down and we're going to talk
incorrecta1: You will sit  down and we're going to talk
incorrecta2: You would sit  down and we're going to talk
incorrecta3: You're going to sat  down and we're going to talk

pregunta: Os sentareis cerca de Maria y Mark
respuesta: You will sit next to Mary and Mark
incorrecta1: You would sit next to Mary and Mark
incorrecta2: You're going to sit next to Mary and Mark
incorrecta3: You will sat next to Mary and Mark
